name: Supergirl knit bodice dress ! POW custom sz 18M-sz 8
description:
Its a bird , its a plane, no  its Supergirl!!

Who doesn't want to be a superhero?!! 
This dress features a stretchy knit bodice with accent chevron cuffs and collar. A super twirl skirt adds to the flare to the dress, while the coordinating ribbon trim finishes this design off perfectly! 

100% cotton, All of my clothing comes with tags and are professionally finished

Specify size at checkout! I can make in between sizes just note at checkout 
Sizing is true to size, 
finished lengths are : 
sz 18M -18" 
sz 2 - 20" 
sz 3 -21.5
sz 4 - 23" 
sz 5 -24"
sz 6- 25" 
sz 8 -27

Please allow 2-3 weeks for your items to be made especially for you. If you need the item sooner, please let me know. I will work with you.

Refunds and exchanges will generally not be accepted for the following reasons: 
* Slight color variations in fabric due to differences in computer screens and colors 
* Sizing issues ( Please ask questions before you order.) 
* Modified designs and custom orders 
* Items that were made to your specific measurements.

I ONLY accept returns if there is an obvious defect in workmanship and the item has not been worn nor washed. The buyer should contact me within 24 hours of receiving the item. Returns should be shipped within 7 days from the date you received your item with a tracking number given to me. . Buyer pays for return shipping. All shipping charges are non-refundable!

name: UP UP and AWAY!!!
description:
Live life in the clouds with this fun and flirty knit bodice racer tank tunic top.


Stretchy cotton bodice, sash to accommodate that perfect fit!

Made of 100% cotton,and all seams are professionally serged. The gathered skirt is full and gives your little girl plenty of room to be comfortable.


Can also be made as a dress for an additional charge.


100% cotton, All of my clothing comes with tags and are professionally finished

Adorable princess and castle fabric make up the skirt along with coordinating trim.
Attached sash adds a nice pop of pink!

Lots of twirl and imagination on this piece!

name: Custom Hobo spot
description:
Create your own bag! You choose the fabric.

Bag is fully lined with matching fabric, accented with ribbon, ruffles, pockets, buttons! Th choices are endless!

Can be made in a small bag, mini hobo, medium hobo, or large hobo.
